title: 149: The French Revolution: Paris Unveils New Bistros, New Menus, and New Chefs
itunes:title: 149: The French Revolution: Paris Unveils New Bistros, New Menus, and New Chefs
itunes:subtitle: Lindsey Tramuta on the New Paris cuisine; we take a pilgrimage to India; offer a new recipe for steamed marmalade pudding; and wine expert Stephen Meuse has tips on the best glasses to use for champagne.
description:
Lindsey Tramuta on the New Paris cuisine; we take a pilgrimage to India; offer a new recipe for steamed marmalade pudding; and wine expert Stephen Meuse has tips on the best glasses to use for champagne.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
